parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The display name of the playbook.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default).
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: ReleaseVersion
parameters.description:
The release version of the playbook that you want to copy. Default value: 0. Valid values:

*   \-1: The version that is being edited.
*   0: The latest online version of the current playbook.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the user who switches from the current view to the destination view by using the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:

*   **0** (default): the view of the current account.
*   **1**: the view of the global account.

parameters.name: SourcePlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook that you want to copy.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.
